procedure.description: Delete an xml attribute from an element in a given xml text.

formalParameter.description: Name of the attribute to delete.
Query to get the element in the XML.
Path to the XML file to parse.
Path to the property where the xml is located.
XML code to parse.
Path to property to hold the XML.

procedure.description: Delete an xml element from a given xml text.

formalParameter.description: Path to the XML file to parse.
Path to the property where the xml is located.
XML code to parse.
Query to get the element to delete in the XML.
Path to property to hold the XML.

procedure.description: Extract an xml attribute value from an element in a given xml text.

Path to the property to hold the attribute extracted.
Path to the property sheet to hold the attributes extracted.
Path to the property to hold the resulting xml.

Path to the property where the xml is located.
Query to get the element to extract in the XML.
XML code to parse.

procedure.description: Extract an xml element from a given xml text.

Path to the property where the xml is located.
Query to get the element to extract in the XML.
Path to property to hold the XML element extracted.
Path to property sheet to hold the XML elements extracted.
Path to the property to hold the resulting xml.

procedure.description: Insert an xml attribute in an element on a given xml text.

Query to get the element to read in the XML.

Path to property to hold the XML.

procedure.description: Insert an xml element on a given xml text.

Path to the XML file to parse.
Path to the property where the xml is located.
Query to get the element to read in the XML.
XML code to parse.
Path to property to hold the XML.
